duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop visually appealing and effective PowerPoint presentations for the Executive Office of the CEO Gaming.
Create and maintain clear and engaging written and verbal communication materials.
Utilize animation and motion to enhance visual storytelling in presentations.
Visualize and design in 2D and 3D to achieve aesthetic design goals.
Utilize Adobe publishing and graphics software to create compelling visual content.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree in design and/or certificate in graphic design (Bachelor's degree in design or related field preferred)
